name: x8 Matching Balls
description:
Drop the Balls and Collect Higher Numbered Balls!

By dropping the numbered Balls down, you can add them and make bigger summed Balls!

More higher numbered Balls you add, more points you get, Higher the points, higher the ranks!

Try to create the 4096x Awesome looking Ball with Fire and Effects.

[How to Play]
- Drop the Balls onto another one with the same number.
- Merge or combine them into a bigger number.
- Get bigger numbered Balls and earn higher points!

[Features]
- Free to play
- World Ranking System
- In-game Boosters
- Offline mode: no wifi or data needed for gameplay
- Smooth and amazing gameplay
- Optimized for Tablets

Can you become the #1 player in Drop the Number?
